entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023
